ul.li: The Data Processing Function for processing the data collection

conbody.p: The Data Collections page also includes a facility for manually ingesting data.

p.xref: How do I manually ingest data?

conbody.p: Connection information to specific systems is not a part of data collection configuration. Data is "pushed" from the site submitting the data. extracts any necessary connection information and login credentials from the session information. How do I submit data to ?
